name: Thalassa: Edge of the Abyss
summary: Thalassa: Edge of the Abyss is a first-person psychological drama, where you play as a deep-sea diver in 1905. Go through the journey of a diver desperately seeking to understand the mystery of their sunken ship, the reasons for their trauma by going back to the roots of the events.
